name: Sociast
overview:
Sociast unites all the aspects of your social identity on the Internet and reforms them in one place, so you can show people the full you. They aggregate all the information about you from your different social networking accounts and put together the social jigsaw that defines you as a person.

With Sociast, staying in the loop with all your friends becomes pure bliss. This has been achieved through the pairing of simplicity and smart presentation, to create one of the most sophisticated user interfaces ever brought to the table in the realms of Social Networking. Keeping updated with someone on ten different websites was so 2008.
